document.full_text: gonzaga's women's basketball team is on a 20-game winning streak and has reached the n.c.a.a. tournament round of 16, thanks to the play of senior guard courtney vandersloot.
document.title: vandersloot powers gonzaga into round of 16
lines_and_colors: gonzaga's women's basketball team is on a 20-game winning streak and has reached the n.c.a.a. tournament round of 16, thanks to the play of senior guard courtney vandersloot.
